::Spears::

Standing next to her pod, she took a small hand held 3-D map display 
out of her hip holder.
"I need the location of the Maximal ships in the area."
The screen projected the locations. One in Tibet, one in South Africa.
"Gee, that's just a hop, skip and a jump from here isn't it?" she 
said sarcastically. 
"Are there any transport pods around other than mine?"
The screen protected one on the edge of the North Amereican continant 
on the East Coast. She looked at her pod and knew that it had 
sustained too much damage in the landing to be functional.
"Well, this is going to take some time to get there. I hope there is 
something left for me to find when I get there."

She started walking towards the transport. She was in the Dakota 
regine. "Yep, a hop, skip and a jump from here for sure." she said 
with a wry smile on her face.
